sentences.en: 4,000 workers have been idle for 12 of the first 27 weeks of this year.
sentences.cn: 4千名工人在今年最初的27个星期中有12个星期无事可干。

sentences.en: A young man idle , an old man needy.
sentences.cn: 少时闲混, 老来穷困.

sentences.en: an idle student
sentences.cn: 懒散的学生

sentences.en: Brian kept up the idle chatter for another five minutes.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩又絮絮地唠叨了5分钟。

sentences.en: Do not idle about like this and do something useful.
sentences.cn: 别再这样闲混下去了,做些有益的事吧!

sentences.en: Go and wake up that idle brother of yours.
sentences.cn: 去把你那懒哥哥叫起来。

sentences.en: He indulged in idle fancy.
sentences.cn: 他沉溺于幻想之中.

sentences.en: He is conscientious and diligent , and is never idle.
sentences.cn: 他是个勤谨人, 整天闲不住.

sentences.en: His statement isn't merely an idle boast.
sentences.cn: 他的话不仅仅是虚张声势的自夸。

sentences.en: How can one sit idle and enjoy the fruits of others'labour?
sentences.cn: 怎能坐享其成?

sentences.en: How much trouble in this life is caused by idle talk!
sentences.cn: 生活中有多少麻烦不都是由清谈引起的么.

sentences.en: I cannot afford to leave the land lying idle.
sentences.cn: 我不能让土地闲置。

sentences.en: In idle moments, he carved wooden figures.
sentences.cn: 他空闲时就刻木雕。

sentences.en: It was more of an idle threat than anything.
sentences.cn: 那其实是唬人的话。

sentences.en: It would be idle to pretend the system is perfect.
sentences.cn: 假装系统完美无疵是徒劳的。

sentences.en: Mike doesn't study at all. Instead, he sits idle all day.
sentences.cn: 迈克根本不肯读书, 相反地, 他终日游手好闲.

sentences.en: The earth-moving trucks and cement mixers lay idle.
sentences.cn: 运土卡车和混凝土搅拌机闲置着。

sentences.en: The whole team stood idle, waiting for the mechanic.
sentences.cn: 整队人干站着等技工来。

sentences.en: The workers have been idle for the last six months.
sentences.cn: 最近六个月工人们都很闲。

sentences.en: Their friendship was turned to enmity through idle gossip.
sentences.cn: 无聊的闲言碎语使他们反目成仇.

sentences.en: They idle away the hours watching TV.
sentences.cn: 他们看电视以虚度时光.

sentences.en: Those making the idle talk are all old fogies.
sentences.cn: 说闲话的人都是些老脑筋.

words.tran_cn: 无所事事地；懒惰地，空闲地；无益地
懒汉；游手好闲的人；[机] 惰轮；中间齿轮

phrases.tran_cn: 闲置生产能力；备用能量
空转；空行程；空载运转；空动
空闲时间，闲置时间；停工时间，停歇时间

trans.tran_cn: 无意义的，空闲的，懒惰的，无根据的
虚度，空转，挂空挡，未熄火
